name: surge_cha0s
description:
A top-down roguelike bullet hell game - manage your way through rooms, avoid incoming projectiles and shoot everything in your way! But be careful, your weapon will need recharging for every bullet used.

This game jam has been created during the Global Game Jam 2022 event, in which the theme was "Duality".

--

Controls

Movement: WASD, or arrow keys
Shoot: Hold mouse left-click
Show/hide mini-map: TAB
Quit: ESC
